page.title: 12LOCAL ATTITUDES TO ANSTEY
page.content: {ANSTEY VILLAGE} A small survey conducted by local school children showed that people think Anstey is tidy and safe to live in. They would like to see more trees and flowers, with less parking along the roads. Above all, people want a village health centre. Most people are satisfied with local schools and do not wish to move from the village for any reason. Heavy traffic is a nuisance and more policeman would be an advantage. The local population like living in Anstey, because it is close to Leicester City, Bradgate Park and open countryside. However, there are fears that the closeness of the new town, Beaumont Leys, will turn Anstey into a dead village.
